verses.name: Romans 2:1
verses.text: Therefore thou art inexcusable, O man, whosoever thou art that judgest: for wherein thou judgest another, thou condemnest thyself; for thou that judgest doest the same things.

verses.name: Romans 2:2
verses.text: But we are sure that the judgment of God is according to truth against them which commit such things.

verses.name: Romans 2:3
verses.text: And thinkest thou this, O man, that judgest them which do such things, and doest the same, that thou shalt escape the judgment of God?

verses.name: Romans 2:4
verses.text: Or despisest thou the riches of his goodness and forbearance and longsuffering; not knowing that the goodness of God leadeth thee to repentance?
